post.body: merry xmas to u! Staying in a nature reserve. 8am & sun is beating down, about to go for Bkfast.
on a roadtrip. Kuruman 2night, after that we'll head 2wards the west coast. Hot as hell though!!!
enjoy. I'm leaving on my road trip right now :-) I've sent your lovely card out to a bunch of friends!
thanks! U going anywhere for the holidays?
thanks! How's your bithday so far?
but do u have this CD to play at the party? http://tinyurl.com/6bx3er they'll love it :-)
"Another f*king beautiful day in Africa" heading 2wards Kakamas 2day
http://twitpic.com/wba4 - kalahari is hot and dry!
http://twitpic.com/wahy - hotazel, northern cape. (it really is!)
http://twitpic.com/wa4j - xmas with family? Kuruman
http://twitpic.com/w9x2 - xmas day, red sands lodge, Kuruman, northern cape
RT @royblumenthal: Dear Jesus: Pls can ya ask yr followers to be more tolerant to others? Specially scientists & abortionists. Thnks dud ...
more stars than I've ever seen! Staying in Kuruman for xmas. Have a gr8 xmas everyone!
http://twitpic.com/vwuv - surprise shop, Kuruman, northern cape. 5:30pm, 34 degrees Celsius.
http://twitpic.com/vv6b - cows on the road to nowhere, northwest province
groot marico is a lovely town, the beer is good & the mampoer better!
http://twitpic.com/vjcs - in groot marico, northwest province. Dan hot & beautiful!
Off to bed...early start tomorrow.
RT @artistshouse: It's HERE! The Artists House 2008 Community Christmas Compilation! It's free & it's fantastic! http://ow.ly/1pE
